description: Bitcoin surges to $13,000, highest level since January 2018, driven by Facebook Libra announcement.
impact: Increased retail interest and onboarding complaints.

description: Bitcoin crashes 50% in 24 hours from $8,000 to $4,000 as COVID-19 pandemic triggers global market panic.
impact: Massive spike in complaints about liquidations, withdrawals, and platform outages.

description: Bitcoin's third halving reduces block reward from 12.5 to 6.25 BTC.
impact: Increased trading activity and new user signups.

description: PayPal announces support for buying, selling, and holding cryptocurrency.
impact: Massive new user influx to crypto exchanges, verification backlogs.

description: Bitcoin breaks its 2017 all-time high, crossing $20,000 for the first time since December 2017.
impact: Record trading volumes and support ticket volumes.

description: Tesla announces $1.5 billion Bitcoin purchase and plans to accept BTC for payments.
impact: Mainstream attention drives massive new user signups.

description: Coinbase goes public on NASDAQ at $381 per share, valuing company at $86 billion.
impact: Increased legitimacy drives new users, platform strain reported.

description: Elon Musk announces Tesla will no longer accept Bitcoin due to environmental concerns.
impact: Market drops 15%, complaints surge about losses.

description: China bans financial institutions from crypto services, BTC drops to $30K.
impact: Massive volatility leads to platform outages and liquidation complaints.

description: El Salvador becomes first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender.
impact: Positive sentiment but technical issues with government wallet.

description: Bitcoin reaches all-time high of $69,000 driven by institutional adoption and inflation fears.
impact: Peak trading volumes, widespread platform performance issues.

description: Terra Luna and UST stablecoin collapse, wiping out approximately $40 billion in value. One of the largest crypto crashes in history.
impact: Massive increase in complaints related to lost funds and platform freezes.

description: Celsius Network halts all withdrawals, swaps, and transfers citing extreme market conditions.
impact: Spike in complaints from users unable to access funds.

description: Voyager Digital files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection after 3AC default.
impact: Significant increase in fraud and account access complaints.

description: Binance backs out of FTX acquisition deal, triggering massive withdrawals and liquidity crisis.
impact: Largest spike in crypto complaints recorded - 340% increase.

description: FTX, FTX.US, and Alameda Research file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy. Sam Bankman-Fried resigns as CEO.
impact: Sustained high complaint volume for months following.

description: Silvergate Bank announces voluntary liquidation after crypto market losses.
impact: Banking access issues for crypto companies and their customers.

description: SEC files 13 charges against Binance and CZ for securities violations and operating unregistered exchange.
impact: Regulatory uncertainty drives complaints about account restrictions.

description: SEC sues Coinbase for operating an unregistered securities exchange, broker, and clearing agency.
impact: Increased complaints about service changes and account limitations.

description: Binance pleads guilty to money laundering violations, CZ resigns, company pays $4.3 billion fine.
impact: User concerns about platform stability and fund safety.

description: SEC approves 11 spot Bitcoin ETFs including BlackRock and Fidelity products.
impact: Positive sentiment, but increased onboarding complaints from new users.

description: Bitcoin reaches new all-time high of $73,750 driven by ETF inflows and halving anticipation.
impact: High trading volume leads to platform issues and support backlogs.

description: Fourth Bitcoin halving reduces block reward from 6.25 to 3.125 BTC.
impact: Increased trading activity and associated customer service strain.

description: SEC approves spot Ethereum ETFs, following Bitcoin ETF success.
impact: New wave of institutional and retail interest.

description: Bitcoin drops 15% in 24 hours amid global market selloff and Japan rate hike fears.
impact: Sharp increase in complaints about liquidations and withdrawal delays.

description: Donald Trump wins US presidential election on pro-crypto platform, promises crypto-friendly regulation.
impact: Market rallies, increased account creation and verification complaints.

description: Bitcoin reaches $99,000, approaching psychological $100K milestone.
impact: Record trading volumes strain customer support systems.

description: Bitcoin breaks $100,000 for the first time in history, reaching $103,000.
impact: Massive influx of new users, verification backlogs reported.

description: Donald Trump inaugurated as 47th President, expected to implement pro-crypto policies.
impact: Anticipation of regulatory clarity and mainstream adoption.

description: SEC announces dismissal of lawsuit against Coinbase following change in regulatory approach under new administration.
impact: Major relief for exchanges, reduced compliance uncertainty complaints.

description: Bitcoin corrects 20% from highs, dropping from $105K to $84K amid profit-taking.
impact: Spike in complaints about margin calls and liquidations.

description: Congress passes comprehensive stablecoin regulation bill providing clarity for issuers.
impact: Increased institutional adoption, onboarding surge.

description: Bitcoin reaches new all-time high of $110,000 driven by institutional demand and regulatory clarity.
impact: Platform congestion and support ticket backlogs.

description: Large DeFi protocol suffers $200M exploit, affecting multiple centralized exchange users.
impact: Surge in fraud-related complaints and security concerns.

description: IRS releases comprehensive crypto tax reporting guidelines effective 2026.
impact: Increased support requests about tax reporting and compliance.

description: SEC approves first Solana spot ETF, expanding crypto investment options.
impact: New user onboarding surge, verification backlogs.

description: Bitcoin and major altcoins rally heading into year-end, BTC crosses $105K.
impact: High trading volumes stress platform infrastructure.

description: First tax season under new crypto reporting rules creates compliance demand.
impact: Surge in tax-related support requests and document generation complaints.
